text: How do I check if an access token is still valid, and if not, how do I get a new one using the refresh token
Yep just like <@U0479B078RX> says you should only have { brackets in the body
You can always run your body through here <https://jsonformatter.org/json-parser>
to make sure it's syntax is atleast correct

The response should have headers that tell you how many more seconds that token will be valid for. To generate a new token I would suggest reading through some of the OAuth  docs, specifically this part
<@U0479B078RX> I can walk you through the setup and how to start sending those requests, it shouldn't take more then 15mins so don't worry about paying. You can grab time on the calendar in my bio
That is going to be the url of your server, in the docs they use localhost but you can setup the server on AWS or digital ocean or where ever
